author: bencomic

right.text: i believe i made it clear that i don't have any money!

left.text: Later you can enjoy the MP3 for the full experience. btw why don't you get headphones

right.text: $12000 a year? so they both have $8 an hour jobs or what

left.text: I'm sorry. My family lives on $12000 a year

right.text: maybe you should get a full time job at wal-mart. that'll increase your income by 50%

left.text: No, we own a business that's not exactly doing great

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 23
